title: Low Priority Q
body: Riot, i had been DCed from a game because of a blackout that occured in my town, na now i have 5 low priority Q game, please remove your welcome to check the BoM (bureau of meteorology) for tweed heads today it will state blackout occured throughout thanyou.

replies.body: Man, I got stung with the low priority q because the client is a piece of trash and crashes all the time. Up to ten minutes now which sucks. Playing with a good connection on a decent pc and it still crashes.

Unfortunately this won't happen. Riot only seem to account for situations in which Loss Prevented is also activated, meaning the low priority queues wouldn't even be applied.

It's unfair.

~~Still though, it only applies to repeat offenders.~~
